Let's face it, the Netflix site and apps don't make it easy.
		We've often spent 45 minutes or more just browsing the catalog, scrolling up and down aimlessly, before
		finally being able to decide on a movie or series.</p><p>We built Flixboss because we were tired of repeating this process over and over. It's better
		to spend time watching rather than browsing, right?</p><p>In short: Flixboss is an improved search engine for Netflix that includes trailers, ratings from
		<a href="https://www.imdb.com" target='_blank'>IMDb</a>, recommendations and actually lists the movies in a logical order.</p><h2>Contact us</h2><p>To get in touch, please send an email to <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="8be3eee7e7e4cbede7e2f3e9e4f8f8a5e8e4e6">[email protected]</a> - we would love to hear your thoughts.</p><p style="margin-top:100px;padding-top:20px;font-style:italic;border-top:1px solid #EEE;"><a href="https://www.themoviedb.org/" target="_blank"><img src="/images/powered-by-tmdb.png" width="100" alt="The Movie DB"></a><br/><br/>	This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.</p></div></div><div id='div-gpt-ad-1524557627880-0' class="lboard bottom-lboard"><script data-cfasync="false" src="/cdn-cgi/scripts/5c5dd728/cloudflare-static/email-decode.min.js"></script><script>googletag.cmd.push(function () {

		});</script></div></main><footer><div class="columns"><div class="about"><h3>So... what is Flixboss?</h3><p>Browsing the Netflix catalog can be a frustrating experience. It's hard to know
		what's good and it's easy to waste a lot of time trying to find something to watch. Flixboss solves
		this by providing a better way to discover and browse the complete list of movies and series
		available on Netflix in the U.S.. class="lboard"><script>googletag.cmd.push(function () {
			googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1524556024290-0');
		});</script></div><div class="column-layout"><div class="column-single"><h1>Privacy Policy</h1><p>Flixboss was created by users, for users. We wanted to build a service that was free
			but also where private information was handled in a <em>responsible</em>, <em>secure</em> and <em>non-malicious</em>	manner.
			The guiding principle from the start has been "do unto others as you would have them do unto you"... and we
			wouldn't want anyone else to abuse our private data.</p><h2>Updates to the policy</h2><p>You will always find the latest version of our privacy policy on <a href="/privacy">this page</a> (yes, same
			page you
			are looking at now). In case the privacy policy is changed we will do our best to update our users about the
			new terms.</p><h2>What data do we collect?</h2><p>The information that we are collecting can be divided into two groups:</p><ol><li><em>Information of a technical nature</em><br/>	This type of data is gathered automatically just by browsing the site. Examples include the IP number of
				the client,
				the browser type and version, the device that was used, the pages that were visited, the time that was
				spent
				on each page etc.</li><li><em>User provided information</em><br/>	When signing up for the service our users are given the option to voluntarily provide more information
				about
				themselves. Examples include name, gender or birthday and none of these are required to be able to use
				the service.
				We also store which movies and series a user has interacted with, placed into their watchlist, seen or
				hidden.
				In case the user signs up for our weekly newsletter we store the email address.</li></ol><h2>What is the data used for and how is it shared with third parties?</h2><p>The main purpose of storing private information is to enable personalisation functionality on the site. You
			need to create an
			account to be able to use the watchlist features for example. Same goes for hiding or rating seen movies /
			series.</p><p>Another purpose is to understand our users better so that we can improve the funcionality of the site. For
			this we use analytics
			tools such as Google Analytics or Hotjar.</p><p>Some technical variables are used in an anonymized fashion for serving of ads and shared with ad partners
			such
			as Google Adsense, for example to be able to target ads to users only in a specific geographic region or
			during
			a specific time of day. We don't share any of the user provided data variables (so called first party data)
			with
			third parties unless explicitly consented to by the user.</p><h2>How is the collected data stored?</h2><p>The data is stored securely on our servers, and only for as long as it is needed to fulfill the purpose of it,
		as it is described here in the privacy policy. After that, it is either removed or anonymized.</p><h2>Do you use cookies (and if so, how)?</h2><p>Yes, we do. Most of the basic funcionality of the site can be used without having cookies switched on, but
			some features
			require them. An example is the user watchlist where saved movies and series are stored in a cookie locally.
			If you want to browse the site as a logged in user you will also need to accept cookies.</p><p style="margin-bottom:20px;overflow:auto;width:100%;"><a class="optanon-show-settings">Cookie Settings</a></p><h2 style="clear:both;">Contact us</h2><p>Flixboss intends to comply with all current rules and regulations regarding
			usage/storage of
			private data (such as GDPR). We realize that the language of the privacy policy can be a bit difficult at
			times so please
			don't hesitate to contact us if there is something you feel needs to be clarified.</p><p>In case you wish to get in touch with us regarding your personal information, for example
			to find out what we have stored or if you wish to use your right to be forgotten, feel free to send an email
			to
			<strong><a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="670e09010827010b0e1f050814144904080a">[email protected]</a></strong> and we will do our best to help.</p></div></div><div id='div-gpt-ad-1524557627880-0' class="lboard bottom-lboard"><script data-cfasync="false" src="/cdn-cgi/scripts/5c5dd728/cloudflare-static/email-decode.min.js"></script><script>googletag.cmd.push(function () {
